titleStmt.title: John Quincy Adams Diary Digital Project

div.p: H.R.U.S. Territorial Bills in Committee of the whole on the State of the Union. Pickens in the chair— He decides that a Bill for selling public Lands to the Alabama, Florida, and Georgia Land Company is not a territorial Bill, and therefore not included in the assignment for this day— Appeal from his decision—which is confirmed by the Committee— This excludes from consideration this day Senate Bill N. 224 which I reported with an Amendment, from the Committee of Manufactures last Saturday— Other Territorial bills passed through the Committee and the House, which adjourned about 5. without finishing the business— The Committee rose twice to report no Quorum, and had none nearly the whole day.
